page.title: 08INTERVIEWS WITH OLD FOLK (2)
page.content: "I approve of the way the village is changing. I'd like to see more changes, so there'd be some more employment for young people. I often go up to Cirencester to see friends, go shopping and see the doctor. I don't use town much for anything else, because there's enough going on in Cerney. "For entertainment I go to the Cosy Club (Cerney Over Sixties). There we go on evening trips and theatre visits. I also play skittles and I get out quite often. I might go out for the day to visit friends. A friend would pick me up in his car and take me out. "I used to do some nursing, then I was a home help for old people. I worked in Cirencester Hospital. I didn't earn a lot, and worked long hours."
